events.title: Annual Board Meeting
events.description: The international Board of Advisors meets to discuss strategy, compliance, and future plans for The Future Institute.

events.title: Regional Policy Workshop
events.description: Workshops for local and regional policy makers on futures thinking and policy recommendations, with hands-on sessions and expert panels.

events.title: Emerging Nations Conference 2025
events.description: A global conference bringing together researchers, policymakers, and community leaders to discuss strategies for emerging nations in the 21st century.
